short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a follow button on nested CosmicJS modules to follow them directly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CosmicJS is a headless CMS. This extension tries to overcome a limitation that CosmicJS has in the dashboard. With current UI it's not possible to follow a nested module directly as there's no link to follow the nested module. This extension inserts a link on the left of the module entry so user can easily follow the link to edit that module.
